turkish_example_sentence: Siz kayıp kedi yavrularını bulmuş olsaydınız, komşular size çok minnettar kalırlardı
english_example_sentence: If you had found the lost kittens, the neighbors would have been very grateful to you
russian_example_sentence: Если бы вы нашли потерянных котят, соседи были бы вам очень благодарны
